docs.text: tuilwindcss ¶ You can find a list of tuilwindcss demos below Tailwind Compatible Classes ¶ Background Color ¶ Background Color Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static class BackgroundColorDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" for i in [ 100 , 200 , 300 , 400 , 500 , 600 , 700 , 800 , 900 ]: yield Static ( f "bg-blue- { i } " , classes = f "bg-blue- { i } " ) for i in reversed ([ 100 , 200 , 300 , 400 , 500 , 600 , 700 , 800 , 900 ]): yield Static ( f "bg-blue- { i } " , classes = f "bg-blue- { i } " ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = BackgroundColorDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff"); font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; } @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Bold"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Bold.woff") format("woff"); font-style: bold; font-weight: 700; } .terminal-686720247-matrix { font-family: Fira Code, monospace; font-size: 20px; line-height: 24.4px; font-variant-east-asian: full-width; } .terminal-686720247-title { font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; font-family: arial; } .terminal-686720247-r1 { fill: #fafcfe } .terminal-686720247-r2 { fill: #c5c8c6 } .terminal-686720247-r3 { fill: #f6fafe } .terminal-686720247-r4 { fill: #f0f7fe } .terminal-686720247-r5 { fill: #eaf3fe } .terminal-686720247-r6 { fill: #e5eefd } .terminal-686720247-r7 { fill: #e2eafc } .terminal-686720247-r8 { fill: #e1e7f9 } .terminal-686720247-r9 { fill: #e1e6f4 } .terminal-686720247-r10 { fill: #e1e5ef } .terminal-686720247-r11 { fill: #e1e1e1 } BackgroundColorDemo bg-blue-100 bg-blue-200 bg-blue-300 bg-blue-400 bg-blue-500 bg-blue-600 bg-blue-700 bg-blue-800 bg-blue-900 bg-blue-900 bg-blue-800 bg-blue-700 bg-blue-600 bg-blue-500 bg-blue-400 bg-blue-300 bg-blue-200 bg-blue-100 Padding ¶ Padding Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static class PaddingDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" yield Static ( "p-1" , classes = "p-1 bg-blue-400" ) yield Static ( "p-2" , classes = "p-2 bg-blue-500" ) yield Static ( "p-3" , classes = "p-3 bg-blue-600" ) yield Static ( "p-4" , classes = "p-4 bg-blue-700" ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = PaddingDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff"); font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; } @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Bold"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Bold.woff") format("woff"); font-style: bold; font-weight: 700; } .terminal-2366273403-matrix { font-family: Fira Code, monospace; font-size: 20px; line-height: 24.4px; font-variant-east-asian: full-width; } .terminal-2366273403-title { font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; font-family: arial; } .terminal-2366273403-r1 { fill: #c5c8c6 } .terminal-2366273403-r2 { fill: #eaf3fe } .terminal-2366273403-r3 { fill: #e5eefd } .terminal-2366273403-r4 { fill: #e2eafc } .terminal-2366273403-r5 { fill: #e1e7f9 } PaddingDemo p-1 p-2 p-3 p-4 Padding Direction ¶ You can also be specific in the direction of the padding. So you can specify: pt-1 to add 1 padding to the top pb-1 to add 1 padding to the bottom pl-1 to add 1 padding to the left pr-1 to add 1 padding to the right px-1 to add 1 padding to horizontally py-1 to add 1 padding to vertically Padding Direction Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static class PaddingDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" yield Static ( "pt-2" , classes = "pt-2 bg-blue-400" ) yield Static ( "pb-2" , classes = "pb-2 bg-blue-500" ) yield Static ( "pl-2" , classes = "pl-2 bg-blue-600" ) yield Static ( "pr-2" , classes = "pr-2 bg-blue-700" ) yield Static ( "px-2" , classes = "px-2 bg-yellow-400" ) yield Static ( "py-2" , classes = "py-2 bg-yellow-600" ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = PaddingDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff"); font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; } @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Bold"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Bold.woff") format("woff"); font-style: bold; font-weight: 700; } .terminal-1767566086-matrix { font-family: Fira Code, monospace; font-size: 20px; line-height: 24.4px; font-variant-east-asian: full-width; } .terminal-1767566086-title { font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; font-family: arial; } .terminal-1767566086-r1 { fill: #c5c8c6 } .terminal-1767566086-r2 { fill: #eaf3fe } .terminal-1767566086-r3 { fill: #e5eefd } .terminal-1767566086-r4 { fill: #e2eafc } .terminal-1767566086-r5 { fill: #e1e7f9 } .terminal-1767566086-r6 { fill: #fef8e0 } .terminal-1767566086-r7 { fill: #f8efde } .terminal-1767566086-r8 { fill: #e1e1e1 } PaddingDemo pt-2 pb-2 pl-2 pr-2 px-2 py-2 Text ¶ Text Color ¶ Text Color Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static class TextColorDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" yield Static ( "# This is the blue bit!" , classes = "text-center bold" ) for i in [ 100 , 200 , 300 , 400 , 500 , 600 , 700 , 800 , 900 ]: yield Static ( "This is some example text." , classes = f "text-blue- { i } " ) yield Static ( "# This is a new section!" , classes = "text-center bold" ) for i in [ 100 , 200 , 300 , 400 , 500 , 600 , 700 , 800 , 900 ]: yield Static ( "This is some example text." , classes = f "text-gray- { i } " ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = TextColorDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff"); font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; } @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Bold"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Bold.woff") format("woff"); font-style: bold; font-weight: 700; } .terminal-2398470860-matrix { font-family: Fira Code, monospace; font-size: 20px; line-height: 24.4px; font-variant-east-asian: full-width; } .terminal-2398470860-title { font-size: 18px; This is some example text. This is some example text. This is some example text. This is some example text. This is some example text. This is some example text. This is some example text. Text Style ¶ Text Style Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static class TextStyleDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" yield Static ( "This is some text." , classes = "" ) yield Static ( "This is some text." , classes = "bold" ) yield Static ( "This is some text." , classes = "italic" ) yield Static ( "This is some text." , classes = "underline" ) yield Static ( "This is some text." , classes = "strike" ) yield Static ( "This is some text." , classes = "reverse" ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = TextStyleDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff"); font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; } @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Bold"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Bold.woff") format("woff"); font-style: bold; font-weight: 700; } .terminal-607894740-matrix { font-family: Fira Code, monospace; font-size: 20px; line-height: 24.4px; font-variant-east-asian: full-width; } .terminal-607894740-title { font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; font-family: arial; } .terminal-607894740-r1 { fill: #e1e1e1 } .terminal-607894740-r2 { fill: #c5c8c6 } .terminal-607894740-r3 { fill: #e1e1e1;font-weight: bold } .terminal-607894740-r4 { fill: #e1e1e1;font-style: italic; } .terminal-607894740-r5 { fill: #e1e1e1;text-decoration: underline; } .terminal-607894740-r6 { fill: #e1e1e1;text-decoration: line-through; } .terminal-607894740-r7 { fill: #1e1e1e } TextStyleDemo This is some text. This is some text. This is some text. This is some text. This is some text. This is some text. Text Alignment ¶ Text Alignment Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static text = """This text is certainly a fair bit long to proove a point. Oh my yes indeed, it really is a fair bit longer than many other examples!""" class TextAlignmentDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" yield Static ( text , classes = "p-1 bg-green-400 text-left" ) yield Static ( text , classes = "p-1 bg-red-400 text-center" ) yield Static ( text , classes = "p-1 bg-blue-400 text-right" ) yield Static ( text , classes = "p-1 bg-yellow-400 text-justify" ) yield Static ( text , classes = "p-1 bg-lime-400 text-start" ) yield Static ( text , classes = "p-1 bg-cyan-400 text-end" ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = TextAlignmentDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff"); font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; } @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Bold"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Bold.woff") format("woff"); font-style: bold; font-weight: 700; } .terminal-2870313248-matrix { font-family: Fira Code, monospace; font-size: 20px; line-height: 24.4px; font-variant-east-asian: full-width; } .terminal-2870313248-title { font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; font-family: arial; } .terminal-2870313248-r1 { fill: #c5c8c6 } .terminal-2870313248-r2 { fill: #e7faee } .terminal-2870313248-r3 { fill: #feecec } .terminal-2870313248-r4 { fill: #eaf3fe } .terminal-2870313248-r5 { fill: #fef8e0 } .terminal-2870313248-r6 { fill: #f3fbe4 } .terminal-2870313248-r7 { fill: #e2f9fc } TextAlignmentDemo This text is certainly a fair bit long to proove a point. Oh my yes indeed, it really is a fair bit longer than many other examples! This text is certainly a fair bit long to proove a point. Oh my yes indeed, it really is a fair bit longer than many other examples! This text is certainly a fair bit long to proove a point. Oh my yes indeed, it really is a fair bit longer than many other examples! This text is certainly a fair bit long to proove a point. Oh my yes indeed, it really is a fair bit longer than many other examples! Textual Specific Classes ¶ We try to mimic tailwindcss as much as possible. But there are a few places where textual has it's own definitions. For these instances we try to offer classes that follow the spirit of tailwind. Dock ¶ Dock Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static class DockDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" yield Static ( "left" , classes = "dock-left h-full bg-red-600 w-15" ) yield Static ( "right" , classes = "dock-right h-full bg-yellow-600 w-20" ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = DockDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff"); font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; } @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Bold"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Bold.woff") format("woff"); font-style: bold; font-weight: 700; } .terminal-546383309-matrix { font-family: Fira Code, monospace; font-size: 20px; line-height: 24.4px; font-variant-east-asian: full-width; } .terminal-546383309-title { font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; font-family: arial; } .terminal-546383309-r1 { fill: #fae2e2 } .terminal-546383309-r2 { fill: #c5c8c6 } .terminal-546383309-r3 { fill: #e1e1e1 } .terminal-546383309-r4 { fill: #f8efde } DockDemo left right Dock Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static class DockDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" yield Static ( "top" , classes = "dock-top h-2 bg-green-600 w-full text-center" ) yield Static ( "bottom" , classes = "dock-bottom h-4 bg-blue-600 w-full text-center" ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = DockDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff"); font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; } @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Bold"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Bold.woff") format("woff"); font-style: bold; font-weight: 700; } .terminal-1275147425-matrix { font-family: Fira Code, monospace; font-size: 20px; line-height: 24.4px; font-variant-east-asian: full-width; } .terminal-1275147425-title { font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; font-family: arial; } .terminal-1275147425-r1 { fill: #e0f3e7 } .terminal-1275147425-r2 { fill: #c5c8c6 } .terminal-1275147425-r3 { fill: #e1e1e1 } .terminal-1275147425-r4 { fill: #e2eafc } DockDemo top bottom

docs.text: Padding Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static class PaddingDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" yield Static ( "p-1" , classes = "p-1 bg-blue-400" ) yield Static ( "p-2" , classes = "p-2 bg-blue-500" ) yield Static ( "p-3" , classes = "p-3 bg-blue-600" ) yield Static ( "p-4" , classes = "p-4 bg-blue-700" ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = PaddingDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff"); font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; } @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Bold"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Bold.woff") format("woff"); font-style: bold; font-weight: 700; } .terminal-2366273403-matrix { font-family: Fira Code, monospace; font-size: 20px; line-height: 24.4px; font-variant-east-asian: full-width; } .terminal-2366273403-title { font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; font-family: arial; } .terminal-2366273403-r1 { fill: #c5c8c6 } .terminal-2366273403-r2 { fill: #eaf3fe } .terminal-2366273403-r3 { fill: #e5eefd } .terminal-2366273403-r4 { fill: #e2eafc } .terminal-2366273403-r5 { fill: #e1e7f9 } PaddingDemo p-1 p-2 p-3 p-4
docs.title: Padding

docs.text: You can also be specific in the direction of the padding. So you can specify: pt-1 to add 1 padding to the top pb-1 to add 1 padding to the bottom pl-1 to add 1 padding to the left pr-1 to add 1 padding to the right px-1 to add 1 padding to horizontally py-1 to add 1 padding to vertically Padding Direction Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static class PaddingDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" yield Static ( "pt-2" , classes = "pt-2 bg-blue-400" ) yield Static ( "pb-2" , classes = "pb-2 bg-blue-500" ) yield Static ( "pl-2" , classes = "pl-2 bg-blue-600" ) yield Static ( "pr-2" , classes = "pr-2 bg-blue-700" ) yield Static ( "px-2" , classes = "px-2 bg-yellow-400" ) yield Static ( "py-2" , classes = "py-2 bg-yellow-600" ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = PaddingDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff"); font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; } @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Bold"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Bold.woff") format("woff"); font-style: bold; font-weight: 700; } .terminal-1767566086-matrix { font-family: Fira Code, monospace; font-size: 20px; line-height: 24.4px; font-variant-east-asian: full-width; } .terminal-1767566086-title { font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; font-family: arial; } .terminal-1767566086-r1 { fill: #c5c8c6 } .terminal-1767566086-r2 { fill: #eaf3fe } .terminal-1767566086-r3 { fill: #e5eefd } .terminal-1767566086-r4 { fill: #e2eafc } .terminal-1767566086-r5 { fill: #e1e7f9 } .terminal-1767566086-r6 { fill: #fef8e0 } .terminal-1767566086-r7 { fill: #f8efde } .terminal-1767566086-r8 { fill: #e1e1e1 } PaddingDemo pt-2 pb-2 pl-2 pr-2 px-2 py-2
docs.title: Padding Direction

docs.text: Text Color Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static class TextColorDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" yield Static ( "# This is the blue bit!" , classes = "text-center bold" ) for i in [ 100 , 200 , 300 , 400 , 500 , 600 , 700 , 800 , 900 ]: yield Static ( "This is some example text." , classes = f "text-blue- { i } " ) yield Static ( "# This is a new section!" , classes = "text-center bold" ) for i in [ 100 , 200 , 300 , 400 , 500 , 600 , 700 , 800 , 900 ]: yield Static ( "This is some example text." , classes = f "text-gray- { i } " ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = TextColorDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff"); font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; } @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Bold"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Bold.woff") format("woff"); font-style: bold; font-weight: 700; } .terminal-2398470860-matrix { font-family: Fira Code, monospace; font-size: 20px; line-height: 24.4px; font-variant-east-asian: full-width; } .terminal-2398470860-title { font-size: 18px; docs.text: Text Style Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static class TextStyleDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" yield Static ( "This is some text." , classes = "" ) yield Static ( "This is some text." , classes = "bold" ) yield Static ( "This is some text." , classes = "italic" ) yield Static ( "This is some text." , classes = "underline" ) yield Static ( "This is some text." , classes = "strike" ) yield Static ( "This is some text." , classes = "reverse" ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = TextStyleDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff"); font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; } @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Bold"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Bold.woff") format("woff"); font-style: bold; font-weight: 700; } .terminal-607894740-matrix { font-family: Fira Code, monospace; font-size: 20px; line-height: 24.4px; font-variant-east-asian: full-width; } .terminal-607894740-title { font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; font-family: arial; } .terminal-607894740-r1 { fill: #e1e1e1 } .terminal-607894740-r2 { fill: #c5c8c6 } .terminal-607894740-r3 { fill: #e1e1e1;font-weight: bold } .terminal-607894740-r4 { fill: #e1e1e1;font-style: italic; } .terminal-607894740-r5 { fill: #e1e1e1;text-decoration: underline; } .terminal-607894740-r6 { fill: #e1e1e1;text-decoration: line-through; } .terminal-607894740-r7 { fill: #1e1e1e } TextStyleDemo This is some text. This is some text. This is some text. This is some text. This is some text. This is some text.
docs.title: Text Style

docs.text: Text Alignment Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static text = """This text is certainly a fair bit long to proove a point. Oh my yes indeed, it really is a fair bit longer than many other examples!""" class TextAlignmentDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" yield Static ( text , classes = "p-1 bg-green-400 text-left" ) yield Static ( text , classes = "p-1 bg-red-400 text-center" ) yield Static ( text , classes = "p-1 bg-blue-400 text-right" ) yield Static ( text , classes = "p-1 bg-yellow-400 text-justify" ) yield Static ( text , classes = "p-1 bg-lime-400 text-start" ) yield Static ( text , classes = "p-1 bg-cyan-400 text-end" ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = TextAlignmentDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff"); font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; } @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Bold"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Bold.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Bold.woff") format("woff"); font-style: bold; font-weight: 700; } .terminal-2870313248-matrix { font-family: Fira Code, monospace; font-size: 20px; line-height: 24.4px; font-variant-east-asian: full-width; } .terminal-2870313248-title { font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; font-family: arial; } .terminal-2870313248-r1 { fill: #c5c8c6 } .terminal-2870313248-r2 { fill: #e7faee } .terminal-2870313248-r3 { fill: #feecec } .terminal-2870313248-r4 { fill: #eaf3fe } .terminal-2870313248-r5 { fill: #fef8e0 } .terminal-2870313248-r6 { fill: #f3fbe4 } .terminal-2870313248-r7 { fill: #e2f9fc } TextAlignmentDemo This text is certainly a fair bit long to proove a point. Oh my yes indeed, it really is a fair bit longer than many other examples! This text is certainly a fair bit long to proove a point. docs.title: Text Alignment

docs.text: We try to mimic tailwindcss as much as possible. But there are a few places where textual has it's own definitions. For these instances we try to offer classes that follow the spirit of tailwind.
docs.title: Textual Specific Classes

docs.text: Dock Demo from textual.app import App , ComposeResult from textual.widgets import Static class DockDemo ( App ): CSS_PATH = "tuilwind.css" def compose ( self ) -> ComposeResult : """Called to add widgets to the app.""" yield Static ( "left" , classes = "dock-left h-full bg-red-600 w-15" ) yield Static ( "right" , classes = "dock-right h-full bg-yellow-600 w-20" ) if __name__ == "__main__" : app = DockDemo () app . run () @font-face { font-family: "Fira Code"; src: local("FiraCode-Regular"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff2/FiraCode-Regular.woff2") format("woff2"), url("https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/firacode/6.2.0/woff/FiraCode-Regular.woff") format("woff");
